title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Agricultural maintenance tasks on a chilly autumn day.
subtasks: Cutting dead parts off mint plants.
Verifying the type of mint (apple mint) by smell.
Trimming back strawberry plants for cold weather.
Removing eggplant as it's past its harvest date.
Collecting carrot seeds to plant in the vacated eggplant bed.
Preparing a pot for a black pepper tree, accounting for soil and space considerations.
Cleaning out a bed dedicated to garlic chives, collecting seeds.
Planting beetroot seeds in the prepared pot with soil amendments.
Adding mulch and support stakes for the new black pepper tree.
Introducing basil plants into a nearby area for aesthetic and bee-attracting purposes.
Setting up a mushroom growing environment with a humidifier and heat mats.
